content: @WG-compiler-meta There’s now a label on the Zulip bug tracker for issues from the Rust community. Folks looking to hack on Zulip from here can work on those and if you’ve got feedback, just mention that it is a issue from the Rust community. I’ve also filed a bunch of issues from previous feedback already.
(I copied a whole message instead of just the link, phones are hard)
The list has also been sent to the core contributors of Zulip and they'll aim to look over and try address them as best they can.
